articles.title: What If Regulating Facebook Fails?
articles.description: It seems increasingly likely that antitrust and content moderation tools aren’t up to the task. Here’s what we do next.

articles.author: Chris Welch
articles.title: Beats announces $149.99 Studio Buds earbuds with active noise cancellation
articles.description: Beats has announced its second pair of true wireless earbuds, the new Beats Studio Buds. They offer active noise cancellation in a design that’s much more compact than the Powerbeats Pro and cheaper than the Apple AirPods Pro.
articles.content:
Preorders open today, and theyll be available on June 24th
